description: Ministry of Local Govt. and Provincial Councils - Dissolve w.e.f. 01.11.2011 the Hambanthota U/C Constituted by the Order Published in Gaz. Ex. No. 329/8 of 10.08.1987 in order to constitute the Hambanthota M/C - Municipal Council Ordinance. Constitute a M/C for the Municipaliry - Hambanthota M/C - The Pradeshiya Sabhas Act, No. 15 of 1987. Amendment to the Gaz. Ex. No. 453/13 of 12.05.1987
